reviewText: It was a German copy. Total waste of money.  It has subtitles.  Ridiculous!

Buyer beware! My wife and I were excited about watching this movie on our bluray player but we could not get passed the opening part of the dvd and it would not allow us to fast forward, as we kept getting an error message. Other reviewers have experienced this defect as well. Don't take a chance and be disappointed like we were!
